backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and CRUD operations for visit entries with access control checks and perâ€‘user ownership enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking spending chart color updates to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes, including chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling auth, profile setup, navigation tabs, and routing to entry forms, lists, and analytics.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Analyt: Analytics view computing totals and rendering summaries, tables, and spending charts based on visit entries.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Spendi: Recharts bar chart showing hospital and medicine spending using theme-driven colors, labels, tooltips, and legend.
frontend/src/components/visit/ImportVisi: Dialog component for uploading a CSV, parsing visit entries, validating fields, and bulk-creating entries with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/visit/MyEntriesL: Lists a user's visit entries with sorting, delete confirmation, export to CSV/PDF, and an import dialog.
frontend/src/components/visit/VisitEntry: Form for creating or editing a visit entry with validation, date handling, and submit logic for create/edit mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend operations for user profiles and visit entry CRUD with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full set of light/dark mode CSS variables for UI and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Converts various error types into short, user-friendly messages with special handling for common backend issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryAnalytics.t: Calculates monthly and yearly totals from VisitEntry records including hospital, medicine, and combined charges.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryExport.ts: Creates and downloads a CSV export of visit entries with proper field escaping.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryImport.ts: Parses CSV files into structured entries with validation for dates, numbers, and required fields.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryPdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML document of visit entries and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color variables, extended utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, and known issues for a patient-visit data entry and analytics app.
